name: ServiceTaxonomyEditor
description: Sets up the Service Taxonomy Editor
author: National Careers Service

HtmlBodyPartTrumbowygEditorSettings.Options:
{
    semantic: {
        'b': 'strong',
        'i': 'em',
        's': 'del',
        'strike': 'del',
        'div': 'div'
    },
    tagsToKeep: [
      "area",
      "base",
      "br",
      "col",
      "embed",
      "hr",
      "img",
      "input",
      "param",
      "source",
      "track",
      "wbr",

      "div",
      "iframe"
    ],
    autogrow: true,
    btns: [
        ["viewHTML"],
        ["undo", "redo"],
        ["heading", "paragraph", "fontSize"],
        ["fontWeight"],
        ["foreColor", "backColor"],
        ["links"],
        ["image"],
        ["align"],
        ["list", "bulletList", "numberList"],
        ["sectionBreak"],
        ["removeformat"],
        ["fullscreen"]
        ["accordion"]
    ],
    btnsDef: {
        align: {
            dropdown: ["justifyLeft", "justifyCenter", "justifyRight", "justifyFull"],
            ico: "justifyLeft"
        },
        image: {
            dropdown: ["insertImage", "base64", "noembed"],
            ico: "insertImage"
        }
    },
    plugins: {
      colors: {
          colorList: [
            '0b0c0c',
            '626a6e',
            '1d70b8',
            '003078',
            '4c2c92',
            'b1b4b6',
            'ffdd00',
            'd4351c',
            
            '003a69',
            '347ca9',
            
            '00703c',
            '5694ca',
            'f3f2f1',
            'ffffff',
            '6f72af',
            '912b88',
            'd53880',
            'f499be',
            'f47738',
            'b58840',
            '85994b',
            '28a197',
          ]
      }
  }
}

ContentPartSettings.Description: Provides an editor for the common properties of a content item.
Provides a Liquid formatted body for your content item.
Provides a way to define custom aliases for content items.
Provides a custom url for your content item.
Provides a way to add widgets per content items.
Provides a customizable body for your content item.
Provides a collection behavior for your content item.
Provides an HTML Body for your content item.
Provides a Markdown formatted body for your content item.
Provides a Title for your content item.
Provides a menu link behavior for your content item.

HtmlFieldTrumbowygEditorSettings.Options:
{
    semantic: {
        'b': 'strong',
        'i': 'em',
        's': 'del',
        'strike': 'del',
        'div': 'div'
    },
    tagsToKeep: [
      "area",
      "base",
      "br",
      "col",
      "embed",
      "hr",
      "img",
      "input",
      "param",
      "source",
      "track",
      "wbr",

      "div",
      "iframe"
    ],
    autogrow: true,
    btns: [
        ["viewHTML"],
        ["undo", "redo"],
        ["heading", "paragraph", "fontSize"],
        ["fontWeight"],
        ["foreColor", "backColor"],
        ["links"],
        ["image"],
        ["align"],
        ["list", "bulletList", "numberList"],
        ["sectionBreak"],
        ["removeformat"],
        ["fullscreen"]
        ["accordion"]
    ],
    btnsDef: {
        align: {
            dropdown: ["justifyLeft", "justifyCenter", "justifyRight", "justifyFull"],
            ico: "justifyLeft"
        },
        image: {
            dropdown: ["insertImage", "base64", "noembed"],
            ico: "insertImage"
        }
    },

ContentPartSettings.Description: Enables the content type to be synced to a graph.
Lookup node(s) from the graph and create relationships and/or set a property based on the selection.
Provides a way to define the url that is used to render your content item.

queries.Name: GetSkillsGapForOccupationAndGivenSkills
queries.Template:
MATCH (s:esco__Skill)-[r:esco__isEssentialSkillFor|esco__isOptionalSkillFor]->(o:esco__Occupation)--(j:JobProfile)-[:hasSocCode]-(soc:SOCCode)

	WHERE s.uri in $skillList 
OPTIONAL MATCH (o)<-[:esco__isEssentialSkillFor]-(sx) 
	WHERE sx.uri in $skillList 
    WITH 
    	soc, 
        o, 
        COUNT(distinct sx) as MatchingEssentialSkills 
OPTIONAL MATCH (o)<-[:esco__isOptionalSkillFor]-(sx) 
	WHERE sx.uri in $skillList 
	WITH 
		soc, 
        o, 
        COUNT(distinct sx) as MatchingOptionalSkills, 
        MatchingEssentialSkills 
MATCH (j:JobProfile) -- (o)<-[:esco__isEssentialSkillFor]-(sa) 
	WHERE MatchingOptionalSkills + MatchingEssentialSkills >= $minimumMatchingSkills 
	WITH 
    	o, 
        COUNT(distinct sa) as AllEssentialSkills, 
        soc, 
        MatchingOptionalSkills,
        MatchingEssentialSkills, 
        j.skos__prefLabel as JobProfile, 
        j.uri as JobProfileUri, 
        j.Description as JobProfileDescription 
OPTIONAL MATCH (j:JobProfile) -- (o)<-[:esco__isOptionalSkillFor]-(sa) 
	WITH 
    	o, 
        COUNT(distinct sa) as AllOptionalSkills, 
        AllEssentialSkills, 
        soc, 
        MatchingOptionalSkills,
        MatchingEssentialSkills, 
        JobProfile, 
        JobProfileUri, 
        JobProfileDescription 
RETURN { 
	matchingOccupations: collect({
    	uri:o.uri, 
        occupation:o.skos__prefLabel, 
        jobProfileTitle:JobProfile, 
        jobProfileUri:JobProfileUri, 
        jobProfileDescription:JobProfileDescription, 
        matchingEssentialSkills:MatchingEssentialSkills, 
        matchingOptionalSkills:MatchingOptionalSkills, 
        socCode:soc.skos__prefLabel, 
        totalOccupationEssentialSkills:AllEssentialSkills, 
        totalOccupationOptionalSkills:AllOptionalSkills, 
        lastModified:o.dct__modified
	})
} as results
